intro: Psychotria venulosa, commonly known as the "Crimson Beauty," is a species of flowering plant native to the tropical regions of Central and South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its vibrant red flowers, which are typically clustered in dense inflorescences. Its leaves are usually elliptical with a smooth texture and a glossy appearance. Psychotria venulosa is often found in moist, shaded environments such as rainforests and undergrowth areas.
